settings.heading: Why KSM-66®?
settings.subheading: Not all ashwagandha is created equal. Here’s what sets KSM-66® apart.

settings.heading: Clinically Studied Results
settings.subheading: Real outcomes from peer-reviewed, placebo-controlled clinical trials.

settings.heading: What to Expect
settings.subheading: Ashwagandha works with your body over time. Here’s a realistic timeline.
settings.desc_1: Your body begins adapting. You may notice subtle improvements in stress response and a growing sense of calm.
settings.desc_2: Most people notice meaningful improvements in sleep quality, sustained energy, and reduced reactivity to daily stressors.
settings.desc_3: Cumulative benefits compound: deeper resilience, clearer thinking, better recovery, and consistent well-being.
settings.disclaimer: Results vary. Most customers notice changes within 2–4 weeks of consistent daily use.

settings.for_1: Stressed professionals seeking calm without sedation

settings.heading: How KSM-66® Works
settings.subheading: A clinically studied adaptogen that works with your body’s natural stress response system.
settings.step_1_desc: KSM-66® modulates the HPA axis — your body’s central stress command system — to help reduce excess cortisol production.
settings.step_2_desc: As an adaptogen, it helps your body build resilience to stressors over time, rather than masking symptoms.
settings.step_3_desc: With consistent daily use, benefits compound: better sleep, clearer thinking, calmer days, and improved recovery.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.fda_disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

settings.question: How long until I feel results?
settings.answer: Most customers notice subtle improvements within 1–2 weeks, with more significant benefits emerging at 3–4 weeks of consistent daily use. Full adaptogenic benefits typically develop over 6–8 weeks. Consistency is key — take it daily for best results.

settings.question: What’s the difference between KSM-66® and regular ashwagandha?
settings.answer: KSM-66® is a patented, full-spectrum root extract standardized to 5% withanolides. Unlike generic ashwagandha (which often uses leaf or a mix), KSM-66® is backed by 24+ peer-reviewed clinical trials and uses a unique milk-based extraction process that preserves the natural balance of active compounds.

settings.question: Are there any side effects?
settings.answer: KSM-66® ashwagandha is generally well-tolerated in clinical studies. Mild, temporary digestive discomfort has been reported in some cases. If you are taking medications, especially for thyroid conditions, blood pressure, or blood sugar, please consult your healthcare provider before starting any new supplement.

settings.question: Can I take this with other supplements?
settings.answer: Yes, ashwagandha is generally compatible with most supplements. However, if you are taking prescription medications or other adaptogenic herbs, we recommend consulting your doctor to ensure there are no interactions.

settings.question: What if it doesn’t work for me?
settings.answer: We offer a 90-day money-back guarantee. If you’re not satisfied with your results after giving it a fair trial (we recommend at least 30 days of consistent use), contact us for a full refund. No questions asked.

settings.question: How do I take it?
settings.answer: Take 2 capsules daily, preferably with food. You can take both capsules together or split them (one in the morning, one in the evening). For sleep support, some customers prefer taking their dose in the evening.

settings.question: Is this FDA approved?
settings.answer: Dietary supplements are not evaluated or approved by the FDA in the same way prescription drugs are. However, our product is manufactured in an FDA-registered, GMP-certified facility in the United States, and every batch is third-party tested for purity, potency, and contaminants.

settings.heading: Ready to Feel Calm Again?
settings.subheading: Join thousands who have transformed their stress response with clinically studied KSM-66® ashwagandha.
